mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "order.id", a.product_id AS "product.id", a.product_name AS "productName", a.price AS "price", a.price_payable AS "pricePayable", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.images AS "images", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item( id, order_id, product_id, product_name, price, price_payable, quantity, images, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order.id}, #{product.id}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{pricePayable}, #{quantity}, #{images}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_item SET order_id = #{order.id}, product_id = #{product.id}, product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, price_payable = #{pricePayable}, quantity = #{quantity}, images = #{images}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
